Question
========
  
Evaluate the following two statements:
  
I: The greater the Chi-square test statistic, the smaller the corresponding p-value will be. 

II: The greater the degrees of freedom, the more the Chi-Squared distribution will converge to a normal distribution.


Answerlist
----------
* I: false,   II: false
* I: correct,  II: false
* I: false,   II: correct
* I: correct,  II: correct

Solution
========
  
Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
